pages.text: Piglins are neutral mobs found in the Nether. Players can barter using gold ingots to receive various items.

pages.title: Spawning
pages.text: Piglins spawn in groups of 4 in nether wastes and crimson forest biomes, and within bastion remnants, at a light level of 11 or less, even in Peaceful mode. 5% of piglins spawned are babies.
